wikipedia_page.main: Nicholas "Nicky" S. Kiss is a former professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1970s and 1980s. He played at representative level for Great Britain, and at club level for Saddleworth Rangers ARLFC [1], and Wigan, as a hooker, i.e. number 9.

response: * Nicky Kiss, British rugby league footballer of the 1970s and 1980s
